This game is an absolute masterpiece. The combat, the story, the enviroment is great! I like to play it when im bored of watching youtube and playing other games, so its really a good game to play when you are bored. It does have some tricky parts in it, but there are many, many walkthroughs of it. If you are the kind of person that cares about the graphics alot, this might not be for you, but keep in mind: this was made in 1998.

Ahora entiendo por qu√© Half-Life es tan reconocido en la historia de los videojuegos... HL es un juego que est√° adelantad√≠simo a su √©poca, siendo revolucionario trayendo mec√°nicas que se siguen utilizando hasta el d√≠a de hoy. Me parece que ha envejecido muy bien, puede que esta versi√≥n tenga los gr√°ficos m√°s cl√°sicos, pero su jugabilidad me parece impecable y optimizada para que tengas la mejor experiencia. Me encant√≥ y puedo decir que es de los mejores FPS retro que he jugado en mi vida, ya que cuenta con un ambiente y escenarios que nunca te aburren y te enganchan en seguida.
Half-Life is a classic. Smooth controls, fun gameplay, and well balanced challenge. Also, hitting dead bodies to make them explode is 10/10.
I love shooting giant space babies
played for the first time a little while ago and was having such a good time. It was running on my shitbox pretty well and i love being able to run around and look for easter eggs and secret passages
What is there to say, a true classic, a must buy for fans of the retro fps genre.

10/10

Masterpiece of its era which is still a blast to play. The gunplay is great, the enemy AI still holds up pretty fine and the uninterrupted story-telling is just the cherry on top of the cake. Personally, I have no complaints with Half-Life except the chapters "Residue Processing" and "Interloper". I recommend the expansion packs, Half-Life Blue Shift and Half-Life Opposing Force to be played after this and before playing its sequel Half-Life 2.
Do I have explain anything about this masterpiece? We all know it's a masterpiece. Has been since those Sierra 1998 days and now. 10/10.
